title: Person of Interest - All Root/Shaw scenes - Part3
author: S. O.
comment: The “I’m worried about the mission” part was cute when Root takes the smudge off Shaw’s face but Sarah’s voice was great in that scene.
I totally missed Root's constant flirting.  Weird that I wouldn't notice it.
“My friend is never wrong, which is as annoying as that sounds” lmao
Shaw´s cup appears to be empty, full, empty, full, like million times in this scene 1:00
I like that John is basically the parent in those two's relationship. Giving Shaw "permission" to go on the steal a jet trip XP
description:
PART 3
All Shaw/Root scenes from episode 3x20 to episode 3x23 (and part of Root's final monologue at the end of the season finale).
This channel is from me, Step Ohpa, where the first two parts of this compilation, and other fanvids are. I lost access to that account, so I had to create this one. 
Different channel, same ships xD

Enjoy!

No copyright infringement intended.
All clips on this video are from Person of Interest, that belongs to CBS.
